data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the Proisotoma complex. III. A revision of the genus Narynia (Collembola: Isotomidae) with a description of a new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Cheng-Wang, Potapov, Mikhail, Gao, Yan (2010): Taxonomy of the Proisotoma complex. III. A revision of the genus Narynia (Collembola: Isotomidae) with a description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 2410: 45-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194271
